main event: Mrs. Irene Page reported seeing a sparkling ball of light intermittently appearing and disappearing over Brimfield, Massachusetts on October 9, 1964.
interesting points: The object was visible for approximately three hours from 8:30 PM to 11:45 PM., The object changed in brightness and would blaze and recede., Mrs. Page was unable to estimate the size or shape of the object, having no phone to contact authorities during the sighting., Mrs. Page observed fluctuations in TV reception during the sighting, confirming similar experiences from neighbors., The object eventually disappeared from view in the distant sky.
